```{.r .cell-code}
data <- read.csv("C:/Users/19098/Desktop/tortilla_data.csv")
head(data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
           state           city year         storeType price
1      Chihuahua      Chihuahua 2007 Mom and Pop Store 10.00
2     Tamaulipas        Reynosa 2007 Mom and Pop Store 10.02
3 BajaCalifornia        Tijuana 2007 Mom and Pop Store 10.00
4       Coahuila Piedras Negras 2007 Mom and Pop Store 10.00
5      NuevoLeon      Monterrey 2007 Mom and Pop Store  9.70
6         Sonora    Cd. Obregón 2007 Mom and Pop Store 11.60
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
str(data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
'data.frame':	14055 obs. of  5 variables:
 $ state    : chr  "Chihuahua" "Tamaulipas" "BajaCalifornia" "Coahuila" ...
 $ city     : chr  "Chihuahua" "Reynosa" "Tijuana" "Piedras Negras" ...
 $ year     : int  2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 ...
 $ storeType: chr  "Mom and Pop Store" "Mom and Pop Store" "Mom and Pop Store" "Mom and Pop Store" ...
 $ price    : num  10 10 10 10 9.7 ...
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
missing_values <- colSums(is.na(data))
missing_values
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
    state      city      year storeType     price 
        0         0         0         0         0 
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
data <- na.omit(data)
str(data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
'data.frame':	14055 obs. of  5 variables:
 $ state    : chr  "Chihuahua" "Tamaulipas" "BajaCalifornia" "Coahuila" ...
 $ city     : chr  "Chihuahua" "Reynosa" "Tijuana" "Piedras Negras" ...
 $ year     : int  2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 2007 ...
 $ storeType: chr  "Mom and Pop Store" "Mom and Pop Store" "Mom and Pop Store" "Mom and Pop Store" ...
 $ price    : num  10 10 10 10 9.7 ...
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(data)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
    state               city                year       storeType        
 Length:14055       Length:14055       Min.   :2007   Length:14055      
 Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:2011   Class :character  
 Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :2015   Mode  :character  
                                       Mean   :2015                     
                                       3rd Qu.:2019                     
                                       Max.   :2024                     
     price      
 Min.   : 4.70  
 1st Qu.:10.20  
 Median :11.99  
 Mean   :13.03  
 3rd Qu.:15.00  
 Max.   :30.00  
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
grouped_summary <- data %>%
  group_by(storeType) %>%
  summarise(
    Average_Price = mean(price, na.rm = TRUE),
    Price_SD = sd(price, na.rm = TRUE),
    Count = n()
  )
grouped_summary
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 2 × 4
  storeType         Average_Price Price_SD Count
  <chr>                     <dbl>    <dbl> <int>
1 Big Retail Store           10.2     2.68  7018
2 Mom and Pop Store          15.9     4.84  7037
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data, aes(x = price)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "blue", color = "black") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Price Distribution", x = "Price", y = "Frequency")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](tortilla_analysis.qmd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data, aes(x = storeType, y = price)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill = "orange") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Price by Store Type", x = "Store Type", y = "Price")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](tortilla_analysis.qmd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-2.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(data, aes(x = year, y = price)) +
  geom_point(color = "red") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Year vs Price", x = "Year", y = "Price")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](tortilla_analysis.qmd_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-3.png){width=672}
:::
:::
